Actions.Text: REFERRED TO MENTAL HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES
REFERRED TO MENTAL HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES

Title: Establishes peer crisis diversion residences
Summary: Establishes peer crisis diversion homes; requires the commissioner to establish or contract for no less than six peer crisis diversion homes within one year.
LawCode: Add ยง31.34, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to establishing peer crisis diversion homes
